description: Product, UX, customer voice, and strategy components

RequirementCard.description: A product requirement with priority and acceptance criteria.

UserStory.description: User story with persona, goal, and benefit.

StoryCard.description: Compact user story card for listing.

StoryDetails.description: Detailed story view with tasks and discussion.

TaskCard.description: A task within a user story.

RoadmapView.description: Product roadmap showing initiatives and timeline.

RoadmapItem.description: An item on the product roadmap with timing and status.

MilestoneMarker.description: A milestone marker on the roadmap.

PriorityMatrix.description: Priority matrix showing items by value and effort.

PriorityItem.description: An item on the priority matrix with value and effort scores.

StakeholderMap.description: Stakeholder map showing influence and interest levels.

StakeholderCard.description: A stakeholder with their influence and interests.

FeatureComparison.description: Feature comparison showing current vs proposed capabilities.

ScopeStatement.description: Project scope statement with in-scope and out-of-scope items.

ReleaseNotes.description: Release notes for a product release.

UXDashboard.description: Central UX dashboard with research, flows, and reviews.

ResearchSummary.description: User research summary with key findings.

UserFlow.description: Visual user flow showing steps, decisions, and paths through an experience.

goal.description: What user is trying to accomplish

FlowStep.description: A single step in a user flow with type and outcomes.

issues.description: UX issues identified at this step

dropoffRate.description: User dropoff rate at this step

FlowCard.description: Compact user flow card for listing views.

FlowList.description: List of user flows with filtering.

FlowEditor.description: Interactive flow editor for creating/modifying flows.

StepProperties.description: Properties panel for a flow step.

PersonaCard.description: User persona with demographics, goals, and pain points.

PersonaDetails.description: Detailed persona view with full profile.

ScenarioCard.description: A use scenario for a persona.

JourneyMap.description: User journey map showing stages, actions, thoughts, and emotions.

JourneyStage.description: A stage in the user journey with touchpoints and emotions.

JourneyCard.description: Compact journey map card for listing.

EmotionCurve.description: Emotion curve visualization across journey stages.

UsabilityFinding.description: A usability finding from testing or review.

DesignReview.description: Design review summary with overall assessment and findings.

ReviewCard.description: Compact design review card for listing.

A11yReport.description: Accessibility audit report with WCAG compliance status.

categories.description: Scores by WCAG category (perceivable, operable, understandable, robust)

A11yIssue.description: A single accessibility issue with WCAG criterion.

A11yDashboard.description: Accessibility dashboard with scores and trends.

ComponentPattern.description: A UI component pattern with usage guidelines.

PatternExample.description: An example implementation of a pattern.

doThis.description: Is this a do or dont example

UsabilityTest.description: Usability test session with tasks and results.

TestTask.description: A task in a usability test.

VoiceDashboard.description: Central dashboard for customer voice insights and metrics.

FeedbackSummary.description: Summary of customer feedback with sentiment breakdown.

FeedbackList.description: Filterable list of customer feedback items.

FeedbackItem.description: A single piece of customer feedback.

FeedbackCard.description: Rich feedback card with context and actions.

ThemeCard.description: An aggregated feedback theme with frequency.

SubTheme.description: A sub-theme within a parent theme.

SupportTicketCard.description: A support ticket with resolution status.

SentimentHeatmap.description: Sentiment heatmap by dimension (time, source, segment).

NPSScore.description: Net Promoter Score display with breakdown.

NPSTrendChart.description: NPS trend over time with driver analysis.

NPSDrivers.description: Analysis of NPS drivers and detractors.

FeatureRequest.description: An aggregated feature request from customers.

FeatureRequestColumn.description: A column in the feature request board.

VoiceInsight.description: An AI-generated insight from customer feedback.

SurveyQuestion.description: A survey question with type and options.

SurveyCard.description: Survey summary card with response metrics.

SurveyList.description: List of surveys with status and metrics.

SegmentComparison.description: Compare voice metrics across customer segments.

ActionableItem.description: An actionable item derived from feedback.

ActionQueue.description: Queue of actionable items from feedback.

FeedbackVolumeChart.description: Feedback volume over time by source.

VoiceSettings.description: Voice of customer settings and configuration.

StrategyDashboard.description: Central strategy dashboard with configurable layout for business planning and analysis.

StrategySummaryBar.description: Summary bar showing key strategy health metrics.

ROIOverview.description: Overview panel for ROI analysis and financial metrics.

ROIToolbar.description: Toolbar for ROI analysis actions and filters.

ROIDetails.description: Detailed view of an ROI analysis.

CostBenefitChart.description: Cost vs benefit visualization over time.

CaseSummary.description: Summary of business cases by status.

CaseDetails.description: Detailed view of a business case.

BusinessCase.description: Business case header with key information.

CaseSection.description: A section in a business case.

GoalSummary.description: Summary of strategic goals by status.

GoalDetails.description: Detailed view of a strategic goal.

StrategicGoal.description: A strategic goal with OKRs or KPIs.

KeyResultList.description: List of key results for a goal.

InitiativeList.description: List of initiatives supporting a goal.

StrategicRoadmap.description: Strategic roadmap with initiatives and milestones.

RiskDetails.description: Detailed view of a strategic risk.

InvestmentOverview.description: Overview panel for investment options comparison.

ComparisonMatrix.description: Matrix comparing investment options across criteria.

DecisionDetails.description: Detailed view of a strategic decision.

DecisionOptionList.description: List of options for a decision.

QuickActions.description: Quick action buttons for common strategy tasks.

voice-show-feedback-summary.description: Show customer feedback summary and sentiment

voice-show-feedback-items.description: Show individual feedback items with filtering

voice-show-nps-analysis.description: Show NPS score analysis and drivers

voice-show-surveys.description: Show surveys and create new surveys

voice-show-segment-analysis.description: Show voice metrics by customer segment

strategy-show-goal-details.description: Show strategic goal details with OKRs
